plot: The invasion seems to be succeeding until Aang learns that their arrival was anticipated. Zuko confronts his father.

Aang discovers the Fire Lord and the rest of the inhabitants at the capitol have evacuated, they are hidden in a underground bunker. Aang, Sokka, and Toph confront Azula, but she continues to stall. Azula brings up Suki, causing an angry Sokka to confront the crown princess for imprisoning his girlfriend. Azula refuses to give away Suki's whereabouts and she escapes. Meanwhile, Zuko confronts his father in his underground bunker and he adamantly tells his father that he's done earning his love, he disowns his father for scarring him and for his warmongering. Zuko makes an even more important decision, he decides to help the Avatar and put an end to the war.—dawsonpersi
